# upj53.github.io

```shell
bundle install
bundle exec jekyll serve
bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --drafts

set JEKYLL_ENV=production 
set JEKYLL_ENV=draft
bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --drafts

Set-Variable -name JEKYLL_ENV -value production; bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --drafts
```
